events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, but the delivery is still delayed and the tracking information hasn't updated for several days.
System has classified the customer issue under 'Delivery Delay' due to keywords related to late shipping and tracking delays.
Customer support representative assigned to handle this delivery delay inquiry.
Hello! I’m very sorry to hear your order has been delayed. Let me check the status and help you out.
Could you please provide your order number so I can look up the shipment details and give you an update?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I checked tracking but it hasn’t changed in days, which is worrying.
Thank you for the info. I've contacted the courier to expedite the delivery and will update you within 24 hours.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate you escalating this and look forward to the update.
Your order is now out for delivery and should arrive by the end of the day. Thanks for your patience.
Just checking in to ensure you received your package and that everything is in order now.
Since your delivery is confirmed, I'm closing this case. Please reach out if you need any more help.
